beachball-questions.question: What is the yo form of 'hablar' in present tense?
What is the tú form of 'comer' in present tense?
What is the él/ella form of 'vivir' in present tense?
What is the nosotros form of 'ser' in past tense?
What is the yo form of 'tener' in future tense?
What is the yo form of 'escribir' in present tense?
What is the tú form of 'hacer' in present tense?
What is the nosotros form of 'estar' in present tense?
What is the ellos/ellas form of 'beber' in present tense?
What is the yo form of 'poder' in present tense?

coral-questions.question: Ellos (have) ________ una fiesta el fin de semana pasado.
Mi madre está (happy)________ porque ganó un premio.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El sol brilla.
comprehension-questions.hint: Sol means sun, brilla means shines.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Yo camino a la escuela.
comprehension-questions.hint: Camino means walk, escuela means school.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Tú comes manzanas.
comprehension-questions.hint: Comes means eat, manzanas means apples.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ella tiene una bicicleta.
comprehension-questions.hint: Tiene means has, bicicleta means bicycle.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Nosotros vemos la televisión.
comprehension-questions.hint: Vemos means watch, televisión means television.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ellos escuchan música.
comprehension-questions.hint: Escuchan means listen, música means music.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Cómo estás?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: How are you?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Estoy cansado.
comprehension-questions.hint: Estoy means I am, cansado means tired.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Dónde vives?
comprehension-questions.hint: Dónde means where, vives means do you live.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Vivo en una ciudad pequeña.
comprehension-questions.hint: Vivo means I live, ciudad means city, pequeña means small.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Hoy es lunes.
comprehension-questions.hint: Hoy means today, lunes means Monday.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Hace frío hoy.
comprehension-questions.hint: Hace frío means it’s cold, hoy means today.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Me llamo Ana.
comprehension-questions.hint: Me llamo means my name is.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Qué te gusta hacer?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: What do you like to do?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Me gusta bailar.
comprehension-questions.hint: Me gusta means I like, bailar means to dance.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El perro duerme mucho.
comprehension-questions.hint: Perro means dog, duerme means sleeps, mucho means a lot.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Los niños saltan en el patio.
comprehension-questions.hint: Niños means children, saltan means jump, patio means yard.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Tú lees muy bien.
comprehension-questions.hint: Lees means read, muy bien means very well.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Cuántos años tienes?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: How old are you?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Tengo diez años.
comprehension-questions.hint: Tengo means I have, diez años means ten years (old).

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Él abre la puerta.
comprehension-questions.hint: Abre means opens, puerta means door.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Nosotros escribimos en el cuaderno.
comprehension-questions.hint: Escribimos means write, cuaderno means notebook.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Qué día es hoy?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: What day is today?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El autobús llega tarde.
comprehension-questions.hint: Autobús means bus, llega means arrives, tarde means late.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ellas bailan en la fiesta.
comprehension-questions.hint: Bailan means dance, fiesta means party.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Tienes hermanos?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: Do you have siblings?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Sí, tengo dos hermanas.
comprehension-questions.hint: Tengo means I have, hermanas means sisters.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El bebé llora mucho.
comprehension-questions.hint: Bebé means baby, llora means cries.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Yo miro las estrellas.
comprehension-questions.hint: Miro means look/watch, estrellas means stars.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El libro está en la mesa.
comprehension-questions.hint: Libro means book, mesa means table.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Yo tengo un perro.
comprehension-questions.hint: Tengo means I have, perro means dog.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ella es mi hermana.
comprehension-questions.hint: Es means is, hermana means sister.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Nosotros comemos pan.
comprehension-questions.hint: Comemos means we eat, pan means bread.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Él vive en México.
comprehension-questions.hint: Vive means lives, México is Mexico.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Tú hablas inglés.
comprehension-questions.hint: Hablas means you speak, inglés means English.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ellos corren en el parque.
comprehension-questions.hint: Corren means run, parque means park.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Yo estudio español.
comprehension-questions.hint: Estudio means I study, español means Spanish.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Tú tienes un lápiz?
comprehension-questions.hint: Tienes means you have, lápiz means pencil.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: La casa es grande.
comprehension-questions.hint: Casa means house, grande means big.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Mi mamá cocina arroz.
comprehension-questions.hint: Cocina means cooks, arroz means rice.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Nosotros leemos un libro.
comprehension-questions.hint: Leemos means we read, libro means book.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Dónde está el gato?
comprehension-questions.hint: Dónde means where, gato means cat.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Yo bebo agua.
comprehension-questions.hint: Bebo means I drink, agua means water.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Ellas cantan bien.
comprehension-questions.hint: Cantan means sing, bien means well.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: ¿Qué hora es?
comprehension-questions.hint: Means: What time is it?

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Tú escribes una carta.
comprehension-questions.hint: Escribes means you write, carta means letter.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: El niño juega con la pelota.
comprehension-questions.hint: Niño means boy, juega means plays, pelota means ball.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: La escuela está cerrada.
comprehension-questions.hint: Escuela means school, cerrada means closed.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Nosotros vamos al mercado.
comprehension-questions.hint: Vamos means we go, mercado means market.

comprehension-questions.question: Translate the sentence: Me gusta el chocolate.
comprehension-questions.hint: Me gusta means I like, chocolate means chocolate.
